snippet.title: (SNES) Syndicate  gameplay
snippet.description:
Just a bit of gameplay for Syndicate, the snes version is not too bad. Whenever i get mario paint i would like to revisit this game to test the mouse.

For anyone wondering i recorded this using the startech usb3.0 capture card and HD retrovision snes cables, i used  the micomsoft drivers  XCapture-1 driver .1.0.141.5. This thread talks about how to make these modifed drivers and also has a premade set for people by Thrill  http://shmups.system11.org/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=46689&start=240

Here are the capture card settings to use with amarectv310.
Snes setting i made with the 240p test suite cart
Brightness: 136
Contrast: 152
Hue: 136
Saturation: 185
